TopicTitle: Existing & proposed Pe and Ap text overlap

Articles.Content: Sorry if this has been brought up already, new to the game and forum. But I have noticed that the existing Apoapsis/Periapsis text overlaps with the projected Ap/Pe when making small adjustments making it hard to read. May be a new window that you could turn off or on to see your projected Ap & Pe. Other than that great game!
